import React, { useState } from "react"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import coffeeBg from "../assets/coffee-bg.jpg"; const Services = () => { const [selectedService, setSelectedService] = useState(null); const services = [ { id: 1, title: "Dine-In Service", emoji: "â˜•", description: "Enjoy our premium coffee in a cozy atmosphere", details: { image: "dine-in.jpg", fullDescription: "Our dine-in service offers a comfortable environment where you can enjoy handcrafted coffee beverages made by our expert baristas. Relax in our thoughtfully designed space with free Wi-Fi and power outlets at every table.", features: [ "Comfortable seating arrangements", "Free Wi-Fi access", "Power outlets at every table", "Quiet zones available", "Newspapers and magazines" ], hours: "7:00 AM - 9:00 PM Daily" } }, { id: 2, title: "Takeaway/Parcel", emoji: "ðŸ›ï¸", description: "Get your favorite coffee on the go", details: { image: "takeaway.jpg", fullDescription: "For customers on the move, our takeaway service ensures you don't have to compromise on quality. We use premium packaging to maintain temperature and flavor integrity of your beverages.", features: [ "Express service line", "Eco-friendly packaging", "Temperature-controlled cups", "Pre-order via app", "Curbside pickup available" ], hours: "6:00 AM - 10:00 PM Daily" } }, // ... (other services with similar details structure) ]; const closeDetails = () => { setSelectedService(null); }; return (
